title: Higher Floor Space Index may be allowed for certain uses in congested and non-congested area, except
clause_text: Higher Floor Space Index may be allowed for certain uses in congested and non-congested area, except as otherwise specified and subject to following conditions :
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets
